frameDefinitions: An Experiencer has an easy or difficult time carrying out an Activity.
A Payer gives up (or potentially gives up) the use of an Asset (generally money) in order to achieve an Intended_event.
A Dependent state-of-affairs has a Requirement as a prerequisite for obtaining or occurring.
In this frame a Patient, which is  an organic substance, undergoes the natural process of decaying from an Initial_state to a Result.
The obtaining of a Requirement state of affairs or the presence of a Required_entity is profiled as a prerequisite for the obtaining or occurring of a Dependent state-of-affairs.
A Duty is imposed on a Responsible_party according to a Principle which regulates how the Responsible_party should respond to a Situation.
frameExamples: It 'll <t>cost</t> Sandra's parents fifty grand a year for her to attend that school.
The atomic bombings were probably not <t>necessary</t> to win WWII without a mainland invasion of Japan.
The leaves <t>rotted</t> into a mass of slime.
They escaped total Soviet invasion and occupation only by entering into a separate agreement that <t>obligated</t> them to military action against the retreating German armies.
listRoleDefinitions: This Frame Element marks expressions indicating the <fen>Activity</fen> that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> finds difficult or easy. In many cases, the relevant <fen>Activity</fen> has to be inferred from the context.
This Frame Element marks expressions that indicate which person judges carrying out the <fen>Activity</fen> to be easy or difficult.
The time at which the <fen>Activity</fen> takes place.
The role <fen>Goods</fen> is the item(s) whose price is being assessed.  <fen>Goods</fen> is usually an External Argument:
The person whose <fen>Asset</fen> is given up in order to achieve an <fen>Intended_event</fen>.  This role is often expressed as INI.
The price of or payment made for the Goods.
The event that the <fen>Payer</fen> brings about by deploying the <fen>Asset</fen>.
The time when a transaction takes place.
The state-of-affairs which cannot hold without the <fen>Requirement</fen>.
The entity or state-of-affairs that must be present or obtain in order for the <fen>Dependent</fen> to obtain.
An entity that has to be present for the <fen>Dependent</fen> state of affairs to obtain.
The time at which the <fen>Requirement</fen> is necessary for the <fen>Dependent</fen>.
<fen>Place</fen> denotes a location in which the specified relation between <fen>Requirement</fen> and <fen>Dependent</fen> holds.
The <fen>Patient</fen> is the entity that undergoes a change.
The <fen>Time</fen> indicates when the rotting occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> is where the rotting occurs.
The state-of-affairs which cannot hold without the state of affairs of the <fen>Requirement</fen> or the presence of the <fen>Required_entity</fen>.
The state-of-affairs that must obtain in order for the <fen>Dependent</fen> to obtain.
An entity that has to be present for the <fen>Dependent</fen> state of affairs to obtain.
The time at which the <fen>Requirement</fen> is necessary for the <fen>Dependent</fen>.
<fen>Place</fen> denotes a location in which the specified relation between <fen>Requirement</fen> and <fen>Dependent</fen> holds.
The person who must perform the <fen>Duty</fen>.
The action that the <fen>Responsible_party</fen> is obligated to perform.
The <fen>Obligator</fen> is the person who imposes the <fen>Duty</fen> on the <fen>Responsible_party</fen>.
A state of affairs that results in the <fen>Responsible_party</fen> being obligated to carry out the <fen>Duty</fen> in accordance with the <fen>Principle</fen>.
A regulating idea  (which may be instantiated as a document)  that the <fen>Responsible_party</fen> is subject to.
The time interval during which  the <fen>Duty</fen> is imposed on the <fen>Responsible_party</fen>  by the <fen>Obligator</fen> or the <fen>Situation</fen>.
A location in which the <fen>Responsible_party</fen> has a specified <fen>Duty</fen> .
listRoleExamples: <fex>The climb</fex> was difficult.
The geology question on the exam was hard <fex>for me</fex>.
<fex>These paintings</fex> are very pricey.
A holiday in Europe is very expensive <fex>for me</fex>.
The painting was cheap <fex>at $600</fex>.
<fex>Attending summer school</fex> is expensive.
No, they've got a special on; it's really cheap there <fex>on Tuesdays</fex>
<fex>In the US</fex>, the political clout of big city mayors is necessary to put this on the national agenda.
<fex>The leaves</fex> rotted into a mass of slime.
<fex>Before he could get to the specimen</fex> , its entrails had decomposed so badly that they had to be thrown away.
Any traces of uneaten food will decompose <fex>in your tank</fex> and foul the water.
Believe it or not, but this cake requires <fex>a pound of mild sausage</fex>.
<fex>In the US</fex>, putting this on the agenda requires the political weight and leadership of big city mayors.
The winning bid committed <fex>her</fex> to paint an oil portrait for the high bidder.

Had she really said the word which pledged her <fex>to marry Horace Holmcroft in a
fortnight</fex>?
<fex>She</fex> pledged him to pay her the money back.
<fex>Admitting a genocide was occurring</fex>  would have obligated them, based on their signing the December 1948 Convention on the repression of genocide, to do something about it.
And <fex>no law</fex> obligated him to talk to the police, let alone the media

The City Council <fex>then</fex> obligated themselves to have the sewers made ready and the
streets leveled off without any additional cost to the Sisters.
<fex>At Dayton</fex>, the parties obligated themselves to respect and promote fulfillment of the annexes.

passageCandidateSpans.text: the New Jersey Schools Development Authority

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the New Jersey Educational Facilities Construction and Financing Act
We DoThe New Jersey Schools Development Authority (SDA)
